title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Dual Hybrid-Based Mechanical Foundations Curriculum for Secondary Vocational Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering concepts and experience operating simple machinery
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain core principles of mechanical systems with over 85% accuracy through an ADDIE-based dual hybrid instructional method.
Learners can diagnose mechanical problems occurring in real work environments with 90% accuracy by integrating online platforms and offline practice with simulation/VR tools.
Learners can perform standard operating procedures required in vocational settings with 100% compliance using case-based instruction and learning sheets.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
